examples.example: 生活中的美好无处不在，只要我们用心去感受，就会发现许多事情真的很奇妙。

translate.english: The beauty in life is everywhere, as long as we feel it with our heart, we will find that many things are really wonderful.

examples.example: 这次旅行的经历真的令我难以忘怀。

translate.english: The experience of this trip really makes me unforgettable.

examples.example: 他为班级做的贡献真的非常大。

translate.english: The contribution he has made to the class is really very great.
